sn6.10:3.1: 10. Kokālikasutta
sn6.10:4.2: Atha kho kokāliko bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn6.10:4.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho kokāliko bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn6.10:4.5: “pāpicchā, bhante, sāriputtamoggallānā pāpikānaṃ icchānaṃ vasaṃ gatā”ti.
sn6.10:4.6: Evaṃ vutte, bhagavā kokālikaṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavoca:
sn6.10:4.11: Dutiyampi kho kokāliko bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn6.10:4.13: atha kho pāpicchāva bhante, sāriputtamoggallānā pāpikānaṃ icchānaṃ vasaṃ gatā”ti.
sn6.10:4.14: Dutiyampi kho bhagavā kokālikaṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavoca:
sn6.10:4.19: Tatiyampi kho kokāliko bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn6.10:4.22: Tatiyampi kho bhagavā kokālikaṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavoca:
sn6.10:5.1: Atha kho kokāliko bhikkhu uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
sn6.10:5.2: Acirapakkantassa ca kokālikassa bhikkhuno sāsapamattīhi pīḷakāhi sabbo kāyo phuṭo ahosi.
sn6.10:5.3: Sāsapamattiyo hutvā muggamattiyo ahesuṃ, muggamattiyo hutvā kalāyamattiyo ahesuṃ, kalāyamattiyo hutvā kolaṭṭhimattiyo ahesuṃ, kolaṭṭhimattiyo hutvā kolamattiyo ahesuṃ, kolamattiyo hutvā āmalakamattiyo ahesuṃ, āmalakamattiyo hutvā beluvasalāṭukamattiyo ahesuṃ, beluvasalāṭukamattiyo hutvā billamattiyo ahesuṃ, billamattiyo hutvā pabhijjiṃsu.
sn6.10:5.5: Atha kho kokāliko bhikkhu teneva ābādhena kālamakāsi.
sn6.10:5.6: Kālaṅkato ca kokāliko bhikkhu padumaṃ nirayaṃ upapajji sāriputtamoggallānesu cittaṃ āghātetvā.
sn6.10:6.1: Atha kho brahmā sahampati abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇo kevalakappaṃ jetavanaṃ obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn6.10:6.3: Ekamantaṃ ṭhito kho brahmā sahampati bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn6.10:6.5: Kālaṅkato ca, bhante, kokāliko bhikkhu padumaṃ nirayaṃ upapanno sāriputtamoggallānesu cittaṃ āghātetvā”ti.
sn6.10:6.7: Idaṃ vatvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā tatthevantaradhāyīti.
sn6.10:7.1: Atha kho bhagavā tassā rattiyā accayena bhikkhū āmantesi:
sn6.10:7.2: “imaṃ, bhikkhave, rattiṃ brahmā sahampati abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇo kevalakappaṃ jetavanaṃ obhāsetvā yenāhaṃ tenupasaṅkami;
sn6.10:7.4: Ekamantaṃ ṭhito kho, bhikkhave, brahmā sahampati maṃ etadavoca:
sn6.10:7.6: Kālaṅkato ca, bhante, kokāliko bhikkhu padumaṃ nirayaṃ upapanno sāriputtamoggallānesu cittaṃ āghātetvā’ti.
sn6.10:7.7: Idamavoca, bhikkhave, brahmā sahampati, idaṃ vatvā maṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā tatthevantaradhāyī”ti.
sn6.10:8.1: Evaṃ vutte, aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn6.10:8.2: “kīvadīghaṃ nu kho, bhante, padume niraye āyuppamāṇan”ti?
sn6.10:8.5: ‘ettakāni vassāni iti vā, ettakāni vassasatāni iti vā, ettakāni vassasahassāni iti vā, ettakāni vassasatasahassāni iti vā’”ti.
sn6.10:9.1: * “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhu vīsatikhāriko kosalako tilavāho.
sn6.10:9.2: Tato puriso vassasatassa vassasatassa accayena ekamekaṃ tilaṃ uddhareyya;
sn6.10:9.3: khippataraṃ kho so, bhikkhu, vīsatikhāriko kosalako tilavāho iminā upakkamena parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ gaccheyya, na tveva eko abbudo nirayo.
sn6.10:9.4: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhu, vīsati abbudā nirayā, evameko nirabbudanirayo.
sn6.10:9.5: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhu, vīsati nirabbudā nirayā, evameko ababo nirayo.
sn6.10:9.6: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhu, vīsati ababā nirayā, evameko aṭaṭo nirayo.
sn6.10:9.7: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhu, vīsati aṭaṭā nirayā, evameko ahaho nirayo.
sn6.10:9.8: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhu, vīsati ahahā nirayā, evameko kumudo nirayo.
sn6.10:9.9: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhu, vīsati kumudā nirayā, evameko sogandhiko nirayo.
sn6.10:9.10: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhu, vīsati sogandhikā nirayā, evameko uppalanirayo.
sn6.10:9.11: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhu, vīsati uppalā nirayā, evameko puṇḍariko nirayo.
sn6.10:9.12: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhu, vīsati puṇḍarikā nirayā, evameko padumo nirayo.
sn6.10:9.13: Padume pana, bhikkhu, niraye kokāliko bhikkhu upapanno sāriputtamoggallānesu cittaṃ āghātetvā”ti.
sn6.10:9.15: Idaṃ vatvāna sugato athāparaṃ etadavoca satthā:
sn6.10:15.2: Bako ca brahmā aparā ca diṭṭhi;
sn6.10:15.4: Turū ca brahmā aparo ca kokālikoti.
